location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 45 TO ILLUSTRATE THE BATTLE OF SHARQAT. 29th. October, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 303 x 175mm, on sheet 357 x 227mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a region to the north of Sharqat [Ash Sharqāţ] in northern Iraq, indicating military positions, settlements, routes and watercourses. Form lines give some indication of relief.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
